name: Styles
JavaScript
HTML
template:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
    <head>
        <title>Node-RED Web Components Demo</title>
        <script src="https://rawgit.com/webcomponents/webcomponentsjs/master/webcomponents-sd-ce.js"></script>
        <script src="/web-components/camera"></script>
        <meta name="viewport" content="initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=yes" />
        <style>
            {{{payload.styles}}}
        </style>
    </head>
    <body>
        
        <node-red-camera data-nr-name="camera1" data-nr-type="still"></node-red-camera>

        <script>
            {{{payload.script}}}
        </script>
        
    </body>
</html>
